How to: Group Items in a Windows Forms ListView Control
With the grouping feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can display related sets of items in groups.
These groups are separated on the screen by horizontal group headers that contain the group titles.
You can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups to make navigating large lists easier by grouping items alphabetically, by date, or by any other logical grouping.
The following image shows some grouped items.
![ListView Groups](./media/listviewgroups.gif "ListViewGroups")
ListView grouped items
To enable grouping, you must first create one or more groups either in the designer or programmatically.
After a group has been defined, you can assign <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items to groups.
You can also move items from one group to another programmatically.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups are available only on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](../../../../includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
To add groups
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> collection.
To remove groups

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method removes a single group; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method removes all groups from the list.
Removing a group does not remove the items within that group.
To assign items to groups or move items between groups
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Group%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of individual items.
